import React from 'react' export default function Question(props) { console.log(props) const answersArray = props.incorrect.map(answer => `

${answer}

` ) answersArray.push(`

${props.correct}

`) console.log(answersArray) function checkEntities() { } return ( <>

{props.question.replace(/"/g, '"')}

{props.correct.replace(/"/g, '"')}

{props.incorrect[0].replace(/"/g, '"')}

{props.incorrect[1].replace(/"/g, '"')}

{props.incorrect[2].replace(/"/g, '"')}

) }
